The survey ask patient express preference regard description HCC treatment , include sorafenib ( described 'oral anti-cancer therapy ' ) , repeat transarterial chemoembolization ( TACE ) , hepatic arterial infusion chemotherapy ( HAIC ) . Please note intervention patient may receive complete online survey give regardless participation survey . Questions also include ask patient rank various treatment characteristic ( e.g. , mechanism action , risk adverse effect , etc . ) relative .
